name: Doodle Wizard
description:
This is an exploring based game where you play in some form of dungeon/castle as a doodled wizard. -- In essence: Explore the map, find new rooms, gain new abilities, and make it to the end! Your ultimate goal is to heal all of your enemies of the evil magic controlling them.

A thing or two to note: The game may take a minute or so to open. To close the information note-cards, press space.  Finally, this game is full of glitches, isn't coded very efficiently, and the combat is less than stunning -- so, bear with me, I can promise you I tried.
